attributes.description: Main dashboard to monitor beaconing activity in your environment.
attributes.panelsJSON:
[{"version":"8.8.0","type":"visualization","gridData":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":48,"h":13,"i":"0f8cece3-7401-4b67-8b19-bd0122e92190"},"panelIndex":"0f8cece3-7401-4b67-8b19-bd0122e92190","embeddableConfig":{"savedVis":{"id":"","title":"","description":"","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"This dashboard shows beaconing activity detected in your environment in the past 6 hours. It consists of three panels:
- **Top 20 Beaconing Hosts**: Top hosts with beaconing processes.
- **Top 20 Beaconing Processes**: Top beaconing processes in the environment.
- **Hosts Affected And Counts Of Beaconing Processes**: Breakdown of unique hosts affected by and counts of beaconing processes.

These panels also have further dashboard drilldowns listed below, which can be viewed by clicking on specific data points in the visualizations:
- **Beaconing Drilldown**: Drilldown to a dashboard that allows you to investigate relevant event logs as well as some statistics characterizing the beaconing activity.
- **Hosts Affected Over Time By Process Name**: Drilldown to a dashboard that allows you to monitor the reach of beaconing processes across hosts in your environment in the past two weeks.
